name: circos
description: A d3js library to build circos graphs

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --compilers js:babel-register  --require ignore-styles --reporter spec src/**/*.test.js src/*.test.js
scripts.test:tdd: NODE_ENV=test mocha --compilers js:babel-register --require ignore-styles --reporter nyan --watch src/*.test.js src/**/*.test.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=prod webpack --config webpack.config.lib.js --optimize-minimize && webpack --config webpack.config.lib.js --optimize-minimize && webpack --config webpack.config.js

author: Nicolas Girault
